product.name: Diablo IV
product.title: Diablo® IV: Ultimate Edition
product.description: Diablo®️ IV is the ultimate action RPG experience with endless evil to slaughter, countless abilities to master, nightmarish dungeons, and legendary loot. Embark on the campaign solo or with friends, meeting memorable characters through beautifully dark settings and a gripping story, or explore an expansive end game and shared world where players can meet in towns to trade, team up to battle world bosses, or descend into PVP zones to test their skills against other players – no lobbies necessary – with cross-play and cross-progression on all available platforms.

product.name: BlizzCon
product.title: BlizzCon® Collection
product.description: Celebrate the return of BlizzCon®️ with a bountiful collection of digital goodies and in-game items.  These packs are a must-have for any player journeying through the immersive worlds of World of Warcraft®️, Diablo®️ IV, Overwatch®️ 2, Hearthstone®️ and Warcraft Rumble™️. Whether you’re a seasoned hero or just starting your adventure, don’t miss out on these iconic items and enhancements to your gameplay experience!

product.name: Diablo IV
product.title: Premium Battle Pass - Season of Blood

yellowContent.contyellow: Get the Premium Battle pass - featuring 90 tiers of rewards!

product.description: Diablo®️ IV is the ultimate action RPG experience with endless evil to slaughter, countless abilities to master, nightmarish dungeons, and legendary loot. Embark on the campaign solo or with friends, meeting memorable characters through beautifully dark settings and a gripping story, or explore an expansive end game and shared world where players can meet in towns to trade, team up to battle world bosses, or descend into PVP zones to test their skills against other players – no lobbies necessary – with cross-play and cross-progression on all available platforms.

product.name: World of Warcraft
product.title: World of Warcraft®: Dragonflight
product.description: In this opening chapter of The Worldsoul Saga™️, you’ll journey through never-before-seen subterranean worlds filled with hidden wonders and lurking perils, down to the dark depths of the Nerubian empire, where the inscrutable Harbinger of the Void has gathered her arachnid forces to bring Azeroth to its knees.Deliver justice upon the servants of the Shadow, investigate the dark motives behind the Harbinger’s machinations, and take part in a thrilling new adventure spanning WoW’s next three expansions¹. Pre-purchase² World of Warcraft: The War Within and unlock a slew of benefits to aid you in your coming adventures! All editions include an Enhanced Level 70 Character Boost and the critically-acclaimed Dragonflight expansion³. In addition, the Epic Edition also guarantees Beta Access and Early Access⁴ to The War Within. All in-game items are available immediately unless otherwise noted.

product.name: Overwatch 2
product.title: Overwatch® 2 – Ultimate Battle Pass Bundle: Season Seven

yellowContent.contyellow: Get the Overwatch 2: Season Seven Premium Battle Pass + 20 Tiers,Lilith Moira and Inarius Pharah Legendary Skins, 2000 OW Coins,and More!

product.description: Overwatch 2 is a hero shooter, where players are split into two teams and select a hero from a roster of 35 characters. Characters are organized into a damage class, responsible for offensive efforts; a support class, responsible for healing and buffing; and a tank class, responsible for creating space for their team. Each character has a unique set of skills, made up of active, passive, and ultimate abilities. Overwatch 2, like its predecessor, primarily centers on player versus player (PvP) combat across several different modes and maps, and includes both casual and ranked competitive matches.

product.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
product.title: Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® III - Vault Edition

yellowContent.contyellow: Pre-purchase and play the Campaign up to a week early*

product.description: In the direct sequel to the record-breaking Call of Duty®️: Modern Warfare®️ II, Captain Price and Task Force 141 face off against the ultimate threat. The ultranationalist war criminal Vladimir Makarov is extending his grasp across the world causing Task Force 141 to fight like never before.

product.name: Hearthstone
product.title: TITANS Packs
product.description: The power of myths and makers is in your hands with this new 145-card Hearthstone expansion, including the new Titan keyword, the new Forge keyword, the returning Magnetic keyword, and more!

product.name: Battle.net Services
product.title: Battle.net® Balance
product.description: Battle.net Balance is a different way to buy our digital products and services. Load up your balance using one of many different payment methods, then spend it on Battle.net games, services, in-game items, and more! To use your Battle.net Balance, simply select it as your payment method during the purchase process.

product.name: World of Warcraft Classic
product.title: Northrend Heroic Upgrade

yellowContent.contyellow: Wrath of the Lich King Classic IS INCLUDED with your WoW Subscription.

product.description: The maddened Deathwing the Destroyer erupts from his lair once again, shattering Azeroth as we know it. With Cataclysm Classic™️¹, your journey continues into the era of fire and destruction. This time, however, you’ll enjoy a much faster content cadence, improvements to Leveling, expanded Collections, and more! Cataclysm Classic will require only a WoW subscription or game time to play. However, these optional upgrades can heat up your experience during your adventures in Azeroth.
